items.question: Who should take this Data Science course?
items.answer: This Data Science course is designed for everyone, even if you have no coding experience. We offer a Beginner module that covers the basics of coding to get you started.

items.question: Why is ConnectingDots Data Science program considered one of the best data science courses?
items.answer: The ConnectingDots Data Science and Machine Learning program is considered one of the best data science courses because it provides comprehensive training and hands-on experience.
